column1: Smoque BBQ////I came here with my husband and parents
column2: so I got to sample a LOT more of their other food.  The St. Louis ribs were just okay (again
column4: but I'm not a rib person.  Okay
column7: I also tried the Texas sausage.  I didn't know what to expect
column8: but it had a nice snap and wasn't too spicy.
